requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 Home
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 760 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X Compatible
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 Pro
  • Processor: Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 970 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X Compatible

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
